loading.welcome: Welcome to Lydia Hsiao-Mei Lin's Personal Website

hero.subtitle: Project Assistant Professor at National Taiwan University of Science and Technology

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Focused on artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, design thinking, and innovation & entrepreneurship research. I hold a Ph.D. in Architecture from National Taiwan University of Science and Technology, previously served as Assistant Professor at National Taipei University of Technology's Department of Interaction Design, and currently serve as a member of the Presidential Office's National Climate Change Strategy Committee. I am currently a Project Assistant Professor at the Department of Business Administration, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology (2025-present).
about.education: Ph.D. in Architecture, College of Design, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology (NTUST)
about.education2: Master's and Bachelor's degrees in Computer Science, College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University (NTHU)
about.research: Artificial Intelligence / Internet of Things / Design Thinking / Innovation and Entrepreneurship
